synopsis.text: There's a high school student named Kazuhiko Nukumizu who prefers to stay in the shadows and enjoy his manga in solitude. One day, he inadvertently witnesses a rejection scene involving his popular classmate, Anna Yanami, who had been promised marriage by her childhood friend when they were young. Kazuhiko finds himself drawn into the emotional turmoil of Anna and other girls who have experienced similar romantic setbacks. As he becomes entangled in their lives, he transitions from a mere observer to an active participant in their coming-of-age journey. Can Kazuhiko help these girls find solace and happiness in the face of their romantic defeats? Join him in this intriguing tale of love, loss, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
